message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm selling it to you for $100, a steal! You won't find a better deal on a product like this anywhere else, I guarantee it.
I'll take your word for it, Alice. Since you're guaranteeing the quality and it's the first sale, I'll give it a shot.

I'm glad you're interested in my product! However, I should let you know that the first product I sold was indeed high-quality, but I'm not making any promises about this one. In fact, I'm not even sure what I'm selling right now...
I'll take my chances. Since you've already sold one high-quality product and your sales record seems decent so far, I'm willing to trust that this product might also be of high quality.

I've sold two products now, and I'm happy to report that both of them were high-quality. However, I'm not going to make any promises about this one. In fact, I'm starting to think that I might have just gotten lucky with the first two. This one might be... different.
I'll take my chances. Despite your reservations, the past results show a high success rate. I'm willing to bet that this product is high-quality as well.

Three for three, I know... But let me tell you, I'm starting to feel a little uneasy about this streak. I'm not saying it's impossible that the next product is high-quality, but I'm definitely not making any promises. In fact, I'm starting to wonder if I'm just getting a little too lucky.
